name: 計算物理（二）
description: 在此課程中學生將學習如何利用程式語言及計算機(電腦)來處理常見的物理問題。
goals: 培養學生有分析及解決問題的能力
培養學生有表達觀念的能力
培養學生有程式寫作的能力
培養學生有數據分析的能力
syllabus:
Depending on the progress, the feedback as well as the requests from the registered students, we may skip some topics listed below and introduce others.  

Week 1: Romberg method for integration, adaptive-size methods for integration.                                                                                                       

Week 2: Continuation of numerical ODEs : Multi-steps method and method of Numerov.                                                                                           

Week 3: Continuation of numerical ODEs : Backward method (Euler and trapezoidal) for stiff ODEs.                                                                       

Week 4: Solving linear equations : Gauss elimination and LU decomposition.                                                                                                       

Week 5: First midterm exam.                                                                                                                                                                                       

Week 6: Solving linear equations and root finding : LU decomposition and " solve " in Scipy and numpy, solving non-linear equations of multiple variables.                                                                                                                                                      

Week 7: Solving linear equations: Solving Banded equations with scipy.

Week 8: Solving linear equations: Iteration methods (Jacobi and Gauss-Seidel).                                                                                                       

Weeks 8 and  9: Boundary value problems: General introduction and shooting method.                                                                                           

Week 10: Second midterm exam.                                                                                                                                                                             

Week 11: Fast Fourier transform : Using sympy, scipy, and numpy.  

Week 12: Partial differential equations: Laplace and Poisson equations.

Week 13: Partial differential equations: Diffusion and Convection equations.

Weeks 14 and 15: Partial differential equations: Wave equations and Schrodinger equations.

Remaining weeks: presentation and third midterm exam.

methodologies.note: For practicing purpose, there might be weekly or biweekly assignments

grading.note: There will be 2 (or 3) in class exams. Students can use their own notes and codes for the exams, but  no internet is allowed when taking these exams.
There will be an oral presentation as the final exam.
